entry.title: Tuesday night: Partly cloudy. Low minus 28.
entry.summary: Partly cloudy. Wind up to 15 km/h. Low minus 28. Wind chill minus 19 this evening and minus 37 overnight. Risk of frostbite. Forecast issued 4:00 PM CST Tuesday 07 March 2023
